channel.title: [PI] Method for Updating Minimap?
channel.description:
Is there a method for updating the minimap?
Like updateMap();
or something? I couldn't find one.
Reason I need this is because when my players are doing a certain activity, their minimap becomes black. When they teleport away, it's still black. I need a way for the minimap to update (I am thinking of making an easy command).

item.title: [PI] Method for Updating Minimap?
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

Is there a method for updating the minimap?

Like
updateMap();

or something? I couldn’t find one.

Reason I need this is because when my players are doing a certain activity, their minimap becomes black. When they teleport away, it’s still black. I need a way for the minimap to update (I am thinking of making an easy command).
